snippet: DALEY--Mildred, "Mimi" (Tunkel), age 94, died peacefully in her Clifton, NJ home of 61 years with her family at her side on Friday, July 15, 2016. Funeral Sunday, July 17, 2pm, Jewish Memorial Chapel, 841 Allwood Rd., Clifton, NJ. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: DALEY--Mildred, "Mimi" (Tunkel), age 94, died peacefully in her Clifton, NJ home of 61 years with her family at her side on Friday, July 15, 2016. Funeral Sunday, July 17, 2pm, Jewish Memorial Chapel, 841 Allwood Rd., Clifton, NJ. 1/3
